title: A Simple Consultation Script for Professionals
excerpt: A repeatable, no-fluff structure to understand client needs and recommend the right routine.
body: Start with outcomes: what does the client want to see and feel after 2–4 weeks?
Confirm constraints: time, budget range (without public pricing), and daily habits.
Recommend a minimal routine first, then scale with add-ons if needed.

title: How to Explain Aftercare Without Overwhelming Clients
excerpt: Keep it professional, short, and measurable—so clients actually follow it.
body: Use 3 rules max: wash frequency, conditioning strategy, and heat protection.
Explain the 'why' in one sentence and the 'how' in one step.
Offer to follow up via WhatsApp if clients have questions.
